external_references.description: AhnLab ASEC. (2024, February 16). TrollAgent That Infects Systems Upon Security Program Installation Process (Kimsuky Group). Retrieved January 17, 2025.
Jiho Kim & Sebin Lee, S2W. (2024, February 7). Kimsuky disguised as a Korean company signed with a valid certificate to distribute Troll Stealer (English ver.). Retrieved January 17, 2025.
Symantec Threat Hunter Team. (2024, May 16). Springtail: New Linux Backdoor Added to Toolkit. Retrieved January 17, 2025.

objects.description: [Troll Stealer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1196) is exclusively linked to [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) operations.(Citation: S2W Troll Stealer 2024)(Citation: Symantec Troll Stealer 2024)(Citation: ASEC Troll Stealer 2024)
